ygData.msgSnippet: I think an entry fee would discourage some people from participating, and having a prize makes it a lot harder to rely on the honor system.

I think an entry fee would discourage some people from participating,
and having a prize makes it a lot harder to rely on the honor system.

Daniel Paul Hightower wrote:
> 
> To create the prize money [if we wanted prize money], I would suggest
> a small entry fee of $2-$5, with prizes for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place.
